contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 24, 2012 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest blaenavon-contest-1st-section
Workmen's Hall, Blaenavon Best Instrumentalist: Darren Morris (euphonium) - Lewis Merthyr Prizes - 1st £350, 2nd £250, 3rd £150. 6 bands competed
Nov. 24, 2012, 6:22 p.m. July 1, 2020, 3:28 p.m.
1 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter The Year of the Dragon
2 Lewis Merthyr Band Gareth Pritchard Dances and Arias
3 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne Tallis Variations
4 Blaenavon Town Band Andrew Protherough Jones
5 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
6 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans
